layout.description: Let customers book themselves in any time. Automatic reminders, calendar sync, and deposit payments. No more phone interruptions during treatments.

hero.title: Online Booking for Your Thai Massage Business
hero.text: Customers book themselves in, any time, from any device. Reminders go out automatically and you stop getting interrupted mid-treatment to answer the phone.
hero.imageAlt: Woman booking spa appointment on mobile phone

items.title: Bookings Come In While You're Busy
items.text: You know how someone calls right when you're in the middle of a treatment? You have to either hang up or awkwardly say you're sorry. That doesn't happen anymore when you book online. People can find you at 10 p.m. on a Sunday, choose a time that works for them, and book themselves in. You wake up the next morning and see that you have new appointments on your calendar. No chasing, no phone tag, nothing.

items.title: The Admin Takes Care of Itself
items.text: All those little tasks that eat up your time - sending confirmations, texting reminders, juggling reschedules. The system quietly handles all of it for you. It sounds like a small thing until you realise how many hours you're getting back each week. Time you can spend with clients, or just time that's actually yours again.

items.title: People Show Up
items.text: You've blocked out time, turned others away, and then someone just doesn't appear. Automatic reminders help a lot with this. People get a text, they remember they booked, they come in. You can also take deposits when people book, which tends to make everyone a bit more committed. The last-minute cancellations become rare instead of something you're constantly dealing with.

We were losing so many bookings because we couldn't answer the phone during treatments. Now we get bookings 24/7 and our no-show rate dropped from 25% to less than 5%. It's paid for itself ten times over.
items.name: Lisa Anderson
items.title: Owner, Tranquil Touch Spa

items.text: Our customers love the convenience of booking online. We've seen a 35% increase in bookings since launching, and my staff are so much happier not being tied to the phone all day. Best decision we ever made.
items.name: Michael Brown
items.title: Manager, Thai Harmony Wellness

features.title: Everything's Already in There
features.text: Everything listed below comes standard. No premium tiers or unlocking features later.

items.title: Automatic Reminders
items.text: Text and email reminders go out before every appointment without you doing anything. People forget they booked things all the time. This fixes that.

items.title: Deposits and Payments
items.text: If you want to take payment upfront, you can. Card payments are processed securely. People are much less likely to cancel when they've already paid something.

items.title: Syncs With Your Calendar
items.text: Works with Google Calendar, Apple, Outlook - whatever you already use. New bookings show up on your phone automatically. You don't have to check two different places or accidentally double-book yourself.

items.title: Multiple Therapists
items.text: If you've got a team, each person gets their own schedule. Customers can pick who they want when they book. This keeps everything organised as you grow.

items.title: Your Rules
items.text: You set the boundaries. How much notice you need, gaps between appointments, days you don't work. The system follows whatever rules make sense for how you run things.

items.title: Customer History
items.text: Everyone's past appointments, their preferences, any notes you've made about them - all kept in one place. Have a look before they arrive, and you'll remember exactly what they like.

cta.title: Get Online Booking Set Up
cta.text: We'd love to chat about what you need. Happy to walk you through how everything works.
